template.name: goTerm2genesWithEvidenceandWith
template.description: Show genes and the related 'with' annotations from a particular organism annotated with a particular GO term with a particular evidence code. (The 'with' field holds an additional identifier for annotations using certain evidence codes - see below).

with evidence code: (note: for 'with' annotations the evidence code should be IC, IEA, IGI, IPI OR ISS)

template.name: interologuesOrganisms
template.description: Search for "interologues". These are protein interactions observed in one organism where the orthologues of both participants in another organism have also been shown to interact. They can be seen as high confidence protein interactions.

query.name: interologuesOrganisms
query.constraintLogic: A and B and D and C and E

constraint.description: Search for interologues for proteins that interact in organism:
And that an interaction is also observed for orthologues in organism:
